welcome: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissor, Spock, Lizard!!
rules:
If you've never played before here's how it works. 
 => Scissors cuts Paper covers Rock crushes Lizard. 
 => Lizard poisons Spock smashes Scissors decapitates Lizard eats Paper. 
 => Paper disproves Spock vaporizes Rock crushes Scissors!
